name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development, specializing in building scalable microservices and high-performance APIs using **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask). Proficient in **Google Cloud Platform** services including **GKE**, **BigQuery**, **BigTable**, **GCS**, **Dataproc**, and **VertexAI** to implement cloud-native architectures. Experienced in leveraging **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and data processing frameworks like **Spark** and **TensorFlow** for robust MLOps and data handling. Skilled in **CI/CD pipelines**, **DevOps** practices, and Agile methodologies to enhance team collaboration and deliver automated solutions. Strong problem-solving and communication skills with a proven ability to contribute to impactful projects in leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Committed to continuous learning and passionate about integrating cutting-edge technologies, including **Kubeflow**, **Airflow**, and machine learning frameworks like **Scikit-learn** and **PyTorch**.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and managed backend services using **Python** and **FastAPI** for document automation and user onboarding, enhancing user experiences across **9+** applications.
Engineered event-driven architectures with **Celery** and **Redis** to handle asynchronous processing for over **500** financial transaction requests daily.
Deployed and maintained microservices architecture on **Google Cloud Platform** using **GKE**, ensuring efficient operations across various services, managing infrastructure with **Terraform**.
Created and optimized data pipelines for regulatory data exchange using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, achieving a **99%** accuracy rate in data flow and reporting.
Implemented robust security measures through **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, establishing secure authentication for **10,000+** users, scalable to meet future growth.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams employing **Agile** methodologies to resolve integration challenges, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and overseeing seamless release strategies.
Utilized tools such as **GitLab**, **Jira**, and **Grafana** for effective project management and real-time monitoring, boosting team collaboration and problem-solving capabilities.

- Developed scalable and efficient backend systems using **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows and streamline user onboarding processes, enhancing user experience by **40%**.
- Engineered event-driven microservices utilizing **Celery** and **Redis**, providing asynchronous processing for financial data and handling up to **1M** transaction requests daily.
- Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and automated infrastructure management using **Terraform**, ensuring a consistent and scalable environment with deployment times reduced by **30%**.
- Designed and developed secure data pipelines for regulatory compliance using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, achieving a **50%** increase in data flow efficiency.
- Conducted comprehensive security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards; integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust authentication and secure access management across systems.
- Actively collaborated with cross-functional teams to facilitate smooth system integration, maintain regulatory compliance, and manage successful product releases in an **Agile** development environment.

• Developed backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking using **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL**, enhancing trading operations efficiency by **25%**.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors utilizing **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, providing up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, capable of processing **10,000** messages per second.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring smooth user interaction with the platform, resulting in a **15%** increase in user satisfaction.
• Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols to protect sensitive information.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for efficient development cycles, which reduced bug rates by **30%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and improving process management efficiency by **40%**.
